1628290.name: The Last Spell - Original Soundtrack
1628290.description:
这支原声带将带给你领导英雄们保卫人类最后避风港的勇气。抵御怪物军团一波又一波的进攻，直到最后的咒语咏唱完毕，将敌人尽数消灭。

1 - Commander's Theme - 1:49
2 - In Memoriam - 1:43
3 - Distant Memories - 4:27
4 - Mist - 1:33
5 - A Sea Of Laments - 3:11
6 - Hordes Descend
7 - The Spirits - 1:54
8 - Invocation - 3:28
9 - All Hope Gone - 2:26
10 - Tainted Essence - 2:22
11 - Nocturnus - 4:49
12 - Awake In The Dark - 2:03
13 - Oraculum - 2:22

15 - The Great War - 3:05
16 - The Infected Lands - 3:41
17 - Oath - 2:53
18 - Erebus - 3:43
19 - Possessed - 2:46
20 - A Mission - 2:28
21 - Old Woods - 4:47
22 - Forgotten - 2:37
23 - Wild Hearts - 3:47
24 - Creeps - 2:33
25 - Bleak Visions - 5:00
26 - Sanctus Overdrive - 3:19
27 - Commander's Theme - 1:28

由"The Algorithm" Gallego谱曲，27首曲目将会陪伴你打破紫色迷雾的瘴域。
